item.title: Report E-2024120003
item.description:
Report E-2024120003

Identified by scraper @ 2024-12-04T12:24:11+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-11-26
  • City: MONTEBELLO
  • State: CA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: R&L CARRIERS SHARED SERVICES, L.L.C.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 5000
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: On November 26, 2024, four (4) 1-gallon pails of UN3149 were damaged and released approximately three (3) gallons to the trailer interior. R+L Carriers retained Cura Emergency Services, LC who dispatched a crew from Ten-West Environmental (TWE) to remediate the site. TWE utilized absorbents and hand tools to remediate the site. All waste was containerized in one (1) 55-gallon drum.

item.description:

  • Incident Date: 2024-11-08
  • City: ROSEVILLE

  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Rail
  • Carrier/Reporter: Union Pacific Railroad
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 3000
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: 1. X-2024120121 Odor reported by yard crew. Responded to inspect car and found the A end liquid valve open and plug loose. Valve was cleaned and secured and plug retaped and secured tool tight. 2. X-2024120122 Odor reported by yard crew. Responded to inspect car and found the A end liquid valve open and plug loose. Valve was cleaned and secured and plug retaped and secured tool tight. 3. X-2024120123 Odor reported by yard crew. Responded to inspect car and found the A end liquid valve open and plug loose. Valve was cleaned and secured and plug retaped and secured tool tight.
